name: server
description: Server for DCSS/Decks (Teacher Moments, Interpret Me)

scripts.db-create:dev: db-migrate --env init db:create teachermoments || echo 'Error setting up database'
scripts.db-create:test: db-migrate --env init db:create teachermoments-test || echo 'Error setting up database'
scripts.db-create:ci: db-migrate --env init db:create teachermoments-test || echo 'Error setting up database'
scripts.db-create:dev:role: psql -c "CREATE ROLE tm WITH LOGIN PASSWORD 'teachermoments'" || echo 'Error creating role'
scripts.db-create:test:role: psql -c "CREATE ROLE tm WITH LOGIN PASSWORD 'teachermoments'" || echo 'Error creating role'
scripts.db-init:dev: yarn db-create:dev && yarn db-create:dev:role && yarn db-migrate-up:dev
scripts.db-init:test: yarn db-create:test && yarn db-create:test:role && yarn db-migrate-up:test
scripts.ci:test:endpoints:setup: db-migrate --env init db:drop teachermoments-test; yarn db-init:ci
scripts.test:endpoints:setup: db-migrate --env init db:drop teachermoments-test; yarn db-init:test
